ygData.subject: Re: 1HS Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a suggestion for any class that uses 1HD Slash weapons...DWARVEN AXES!!!! These babies are killer, so long as the creatures u are fighin don t require a
ygData.messageBody:
I have a suggestion for any class that uses 1HD Slash weapons...DWARVEN
AXES!!!! These babies are killer, so long as the creatures u are fighin
don't require a magic weapon to hit them.
Stats are 6Damage and only 26 Speed....and believe me...speed kills. They
are especially effective in conjunction with Dual Wield. I purchased 2
Combine Longswords for my trips to Unrest. But, when fightin "normal"
creatures(i.e. Orcs in High Hold, etx.) the axes are superior weapons, and
noticablly quicker than the Combines. Best thing about them is that if u
hang around Kelethin, you will see them for sale almost every day as they
are found of Lord Darish in Crushbone. I have bought them for as low as 5PP,
and have never paid more than 10PP...that's a bargain for what u are gettin.
So, get combines when u have a chance and if u are fighting many magical
creatures...but, use the axes for everything else. "Dwarven Axes are the
Best Non-Magical 1HD Slash weapons in the game!"--EQ'Lizer web site

Garet Wynn

-----Original Message-----
From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 12:21 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: 1HS Weapons


>From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
>
>
>For one handed slash magic weapons that you don't pull off monsters, there
are
>really only two options worth considering, the Combine Scimitar and the
Combine
>Longsword.
>
>The scimitar's stats are something like 5/24. The longswords stats are
6/26.
>Numerically, the longsword is superior, but it costs something like 56
plat. The
>scimitar on the other hand, is something like 43. If you are buying a
weapon for
>those special occasions when you need to hit a magical critter, but not to
use as
>your main weapon, the scimitar is probably good for your needs,
particularly if
>you're somewhat strapped for cash.
>
>If you are looking to buy the weapon you're going to hand down to your
>grandchildren when you retire after using it for years, then go with the
>longsword.
>
>If money is absolutely no object, then buy a Well Balanced Longsword from
the
>Shady Swashbuckler in the East Commons tunnel.
>
>Jyzan
>
>
>Basil Eckert wrote:
>
>> From: Basil Eckert <athelas@...>
>>
>> Hail fellow bards!
>>
>> I think about buying my first magical weapon right now and wanted to know
>> what kind of 1HS combine weapons do exist in the game. I've just heard
about
>> a combine longsword which you can buy at the gipsy camps. Are there other
>> combine weapons, maybe with better stats than the longsword? I just dont
>> wanna pay all my money for a combine longsword just to hear 1 day later
that
>> there would be a much better combine bastardsword to buy for just 10pp
more...
>>
>> Thanks for your help.
>>
>> Athelas
>> Tarew Marr
